timeline.message: Feat(certs): Add the skeleton implementation for the Rest API.
Feat(certs): Implement the methods to read and wriTe the certificates.
Fix(certs): Make the database id column auto-increment.

timeline.bodyText: I don't know why I didn't notice this earlier, but this class has a wide variety of naming styles used for methods. Would you mind making all the methods use the full word 'certificate', including the 'getAll'?
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Refactor(certs): change the method names of the accessor.
